Imports

components/link

Types

BitRange[T] = range[0 .. sizeof(T) * 8 - 1]

Procs

proc nanp(n: float): bool {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
Utility function to determine whether a float is NaN. This is used in place of comparisons since NaN != NaN. 
proc value_to_pins(value: uint; pins: seq[Pin]) {...}{.raises: [Exception],
    tags: [RootEffect].}
Translates a value into binary and puts that binary value on the pins provided. The first pin in the sequence receives bit 0, the second one bit 1, and so on. 
proc pins_to_value(pins: seq[Pin]): uint {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Turns the bits on the provided sequence of pins into an unsigned integer, which is then returned. The first pin in the sequence provides bit 0, the second bit 1, and so on. 
proc mode_to_pins(mode: Mode; pins: seq[Pin]) {...}{.raises: [Exception],
    tags: [RootEffect].}
A batch assignment of a mode to each pin within the provided sequence. 
proc tri_pins(pins: seq[Pin]) {...}{.raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect].}
A batch assignment of tri-state value (NaN) to each pin within the provided sequence. 
proc bit_set[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T; bit: BitRange[T]): bool
proc bit_clear[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T; bit: BitRange[T]): bool
proc bit_value[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T; bit: BitRange[T]): T
proc set_bit[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T; bit: BitRange[T]): T
proc clear_bit[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T; bit: BitRange[T]): T
proc toggle_bit[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T; bit: BitRange[T]): T
proc set_bit_value[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T; bit: BitRange[T];
                                       bit_value: uint): T
proc hi4[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T): T
proc lo4[T: SomeUnsignedInt](value: T): T
